pageContext.claim: “While Security spending was somewhat more than his predecessor, Scott Pruitt has received death threats because of his bold actions at EPA. Record clean Air & Water while saving USA Billions of Dollars. Rent was about market rate, travel expenses OK. Scott is doing a great job!”
pageContext.analysis: Pruitt's spending at the EPA is not "somewhat more than his predecessor"; it's more than double, according to PolitiFact. There is scant evidence for now that Pruitt has received credible death threats. At $50 a night, Pruitt paid well below the market value for a condominium in the District. His landlady was the wife of an oil and gas industry lobbyist who had business before the EPA. A day before Trump's tweet, the U.S. Office of Government Ethics sent a letter to the EPA questioning whether Pruitt paid market value.
